ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: VBIT Vignana Bharathi institute of technology was set up by the trust in 2004. Following are some of the achievements Institute has received Accreditation for 5 years from National Assessment and Accreditation Council NAAC. Institute has received special grant from Department of Science & Technology, Government of India under Fund for improvement of Science and Technology InfrastructureFIST scheme during 201415. The grant is for 5 years to develop a common research facility to carry out multi disciplinary studies Institute is recognized under 2f & 12B Sections of the UGC act, 1956 for receiving financial assistance from University Grants Commission UGC Institute has received accreditation status for its four major UG programs ECE,CSE,EEE & IT from National Board of Accreditation NBA Two Research projects are being carried out with funding from ISRO and three Research Scholars working on these projects are pursuing their Ph.D. in Atmospheric Science from JNTU, Hyderabad AICTE has approved the institute as a center for Pradhan Manthri Koushal Vikas Yojana PMKVY where unemployed youth from near by areas can be trained in 4 vocational disciplines. University Grants Commission UGC has sanctioned Minor Research Projects to 7 faculty members of various departments. The duration of these projects is of 2 years and the total grant sanctioned is Rs.11, 33,000 Indian Space Research Organisation ISRO has sanctioned a project titled A Study of Variations in Total Electron Content TEC Scintillations and Integrated Water Vapour IWV using Global Navigation Satellite System GNSS Receiver under RESPOND programme. The duration of the project is three years at a total outlay of Rs. 31.87 lakhs.IEEEVBIT SB Women in Engineering WIE Affinity group has received 2015 WIE Student Branch Affinity Group of the Year Award from IEEE Women in Engineering chair for the academic year 201516. The Department of Science and Technology DST, Government of India, has sanctioned a project in the field of Space Science to the R& D Center and Department of Computer Science.The project StratosphereTroposphere Coupling through Observations of ozone and water Vapor: Transport effects on the Vertical Distribution of Ozone is to measure the Ozone and Water Vapour concentration in the Troposphere and Stratosphere 35 km to estimate StratosphereTroposphere exchange STE.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Organization Background and Achievements A brief review of the origin of Indian Medical & orphan Fellowship- work for the welfare of downtrodden and economical backwards families without seeing any difference between- cast creed, colour, race, religion, reasion, economical status and gender. As said in earlier in order to work for the welfare and development of the poor people and bring them up above poverty line and make them self-relient. And also create in the people -Voice of the voiceless and empower the powerless, defend the defenseless people. This organization was founded in Nidadavole-town in the tear 1982 registered under societies act 1860 and got thru FCRA in 1985.in several field the organization has been taken up many programmes in many fields in rural vilages. It is well-known fact that voluntary organizations are the pioneers in talking up welfare and development effects for the emancipation of the poor and oppressed communities. However after independence the Government of India have implemented many programs for the up liftmen of the poor community. The programs has been reached only mar point because the population growth in high. By understanding and in the review of that the origination â€œIndian Medical & Orphan Fellowshipâ€ has come forward to do some justification to conduct activities in rural areas without seeing any difference between caste creed color Religion reason gender and economic status. The main object of forming the organization is to improve the living condition of the ignored under the privileged and most deprived section down trodden people in the society. Its main concern in to uplift the people from their poverty through various service- health education socio- economic programs. The organization registered under society act 1860. In the year of 1982 and obtain the FC R A number in the year of 1985. Since that many programs has been organized for the development of poor community in our area. Mr. N Vijay Raju. B.E president/CEO and Mr. FREDERICK NATHAN. Founder & Secretary are fully highly qualified they have been trained for many programs. The organization was established in the town in Nidadavole This is the center Town for 50 villages the organization was established in the town Nidadavole the organization Nidadavole is managed by a highly committed team of dedicated professionals and trained social workers and animators and having the good relationship with medical Doctors locally for campaigned speakers in rural villages on health and awareness comps conducted all the programâ€™s have been organized with the help local funding agencies. Presently there is 12 permanent staff and 15 volunteers are working with on going project this organization found and managed by the highly committed team of dedicated professionals and trained social workers Since the organization established-involved and achieved in many aspects : 1.Literacy programmes conducted in rural villages yearly 500 benefited-with the partnership local NGO. 2.Eye-camps-to prevent blindness, Health camps and awareness campaigns in rural on HIV/AIDs with help of -European NGO. 3.A-vitamin-capusles distributed to 3-9 years children in schools by the supply from-sight and life -European NGO. 4Agricultural deployment for the benefit of small formers-land reclamation, deepening of old water tanks for the benefit of village community development-food for work with the help of NGO-chennai. 5 youth campaign-action groups on environment and plantation sapless and green and clean Ongoing programmes: 1. Established a government aide primary school in slum place-yearly number of children benefited through good education. 2.Established a government vocational Institution through this yearly 450 unemployed youths trained in the technical skills-Bar bending, Electricians, plumbing and sanitation, and painting and decoration-beautician course and computer education. 3.Village hygiene program through the government support 4.suport to preparation of documentation of Banking for the benefit of newly constructing household families-through the government support All the above activities were being conducting in 3000 sq.yards buildings in Nidadavole-town.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: VLCT & RC is striving for upliftment of the deprived and destitute women, children and disable welfare services. 1.26 lakhs of children were benefitted by vaccination service program. 6000 women were benefitted by the self employment and skill development program and successfully formed 500 self help groups and provided loans through banks for self sustenance, 196 deserted and destitute women from various situations were saved. 1200 camps were conducted regarding mother and child health awareness and counseling was provided to reduce mortality and morbidity among the infants. 56 street children were rescued and rehabilitated. Nearly 112 orphaned and abandoned children were saved and rescued. 300 children living in the burial ground were rescued and successfully imparted into schools. 100 Physically and mentally disabled children were rehabilitated and provided with food, shelter and, medicines. 130 early intervention programs were conducted to detect and identify disability at an early stage. Nearly 720 cases were detected and secured the child from disability. 11 Mandals of more disability cases were identified and 415 children are provided with training. Nearly 1500 children have been benefited by different kinds of therapies. More than 600 children were given training in various vocational training programs to reduce dependency. 1230 awareness campaigns were conducted to educate the society against disability. 23 villages were adopted to provide various awareness and counseling services along with medical benefits to improve the living standards. Our trust was felicitated with various awards BEST INSTITUTION AWARD IN THE YEAR 2004 For excellent performance in Disabled Welfare Services BEST SERVICE AWARD IN 2010 OVASION AWARD A Tribute to Excellence for Child Welfare IN THE YEAR 2003 Chair person of our trust was awarded for her excellence in social service with SADHIKARATHA SABALA PURASKAR SEVA MANI AWARD IN THE YEAR 2013 INDIAN ACHIEVERS AWARD IN THE YEAR 2012 INDIRA PRIYADARSHINI AWARD IN THE YEAR 2003 OUT STANDING YOUNG PERSON AWARD IN THE YEAR 2002 SEVA RATHNA AWARD IN THE YEAR 2001 TOYI AWARD TEN OUTSTANDING YOUNG INDIANS AWARD IN THE YEAR 2002 CAREER ACHIEVEMENT & SOCIETY CONTRIBUTION IN THE YEAR 2001
